revised_title: Edmond Halley's Role in the Publication of Newton's Principia
tldr: This article explores Edmond Halley's significant role in the conception, development, printing, and publication of Isaac Newton's Principia. Halley's support, criticism, and editorial work were crucial to the publication of the groundbreaking work. The article also delves into Halley's personal life and financial situation, shedding light on how he managed to afford the publication of Principia.
